page.title: 04A day in my life by Susie.
page.content:
I live at 3,East Woodlands in Hexham My name is{Susie}Glenwright.I am 8.I live with my Mum,Dad and sister.On school days I get up at 7.30am,make my bed and go down stairs and have breakfast and make my packedlunch,I wait for Anne my friend then we go to school.My school is called{Hexham East County First.I get my spelling book out and write my spellings down, then I get my English book out and do my Exercises,then I do my maths.Then it is dinner time.For dinner I have crisps,sandwiches,and biscuits.After that I do Geography and History which I dont like.At 3.15 we come home.I do my homework and watch T.V. then I have my tea.After that I play with Melanie and her hamster called Sandy.
by Susie Glenwright.
